question: Which of the following correctly define the meaning of the word Kernel?
option1: It is the set of primitive functions upon which the rest of operating system functions are built up.
option2: It is considered as the shell of the operating system.
option3: It is the software which monitors the operating system.
answer: It is the set of primitive functions upon which the rest of operating system functions are built up.
explanation: A kernel is the central part of an operating system. The kernel is the lowest level of the operating system. The kernel is the main part of the operating system and is responsible for translating the command into something that can be understood by the computer.
